content: this is a summary of a legal case that took place in the taurage district court the case involved a divorce and the division of matrimonial property the applicant requested the division of the property including a garage and three cars while the defendant objected the court decided to divide the property in kind with the applicant receiving two cars and the defendant receiving the garage and one car the court also ordered the defendant to pay the applicants legal costs the marriage was dissolved due to fault on both sides and the parties were allowed to retain their surnames the specific details of the parties involved and the reasons for the divorce are not provided in the text

metadata.cost: 100.00 EUR (stamp duty) + 500.00 EUR (professional fees) + 6.64 EUR (court fees)
